title: Is this a common problem?
body:
Hi, so i have this problem every so often, sometimes itll happen in back to back games, and sometimes it wont happen for a few games. It will only happen once a game. So my problem is my game screen will freeze, preventing me from tabbing out or anything, although my music is still playing in the background. and i can still see my mouse and am able to move it. it usually only lasts a minute or two, but it can happen at any point. it is extremely annoying, and i was wondering if anyone knew of a problem like this and what i can do to fix it.

Thanks

replies.body:
When your game freezes up for any reason, it's typically a sign that there's something weird going on with your drivers or game files. Your game starts off running smoothly but starts having some 'hiccups' here and there which causes your game to freeze. I'd like for you to check out our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to see if we can get to the root of the problem.

Hit me up if you have any questions!
